title: Annual Food Systems Summit
link: Our flagship event bringing together researchers, policymakers, and practitioners to discuss the future of global food systems.

title: Climate Adaptation Workshop
description: Interactive workshop on climate-resilient agriculture practices for researchers and field practitioners.

title: Data Science for Food Systems
link: Technical conference on machine learning and data science applications in food systems research.

title: Policy Roundtable: Nutrition Equity
link: High-level discussion with policymakers on addressing nutrition inequities in urban food systems.

title: Field Research Symposium
link: Showcasing field research findings from Latin America and Africa with focus on smallholder farmers.

title: Digital Agriculture Innovation Day
link: Demonstrating new digital tools and platforms for smallholder farmers and agricultural extension services.

title: Indigenous Food Systems Conference
description: Celebrating and preserving indigenous food knowledge with presentations from communities worldwide.

title: Annual Research Review
link: Comprehensive review of our research activities, publications, and impact over the past year.
